sleuth_interactR Documentation

Interactive sleuth visualization with Shiny

Description

Interactive sleuth visualization with Shiny. To exit, type ESC in R.

Usage

sleuth_interact(obj, select_trans = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

obj

a sleuth object already processed and has run sleuth_fit and sleuth_test

select_trans

if TRUE, output a transcript selection box in the MA plot. FALSE by default, since it takes a bit longer to load (about 30-40s). Be patient and wait for the table to show up on the initial screen before clicking any of the tabs.

...

additional parameters sent to plotting functions

Value

a shinyApp result

See Also

sleuth_fit, sleuth_test
